TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed CFNotificationSuspensionBehavior extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Flags that determine how notifications should be handled when the application is running in the background.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype CoreFoundation.CFNotificationSuspensionBehavior Coalesce = int64(2)

Docs.summary: Only the last one of the notifications posted while the application was in the background is posted.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype CoreFoundation.CFNotificationSuspensionBehavior DeliverImmediately = int64(4)

Docs.summary: The notifications are delivered immediately. Any pending notifications that might be queued are delivered first.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype CoreFoundation.CFNotificationSuspensionBehavior Drop = int64(1)

Docs.summary: The notifications will be dropped while the application is in the background.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype CoreFoundation.CFNotificationSuspensionBehavior Hold = int64(3)

Docs.summary: Notifications are kept around in a queue, and they are all delivered serially when the application returns to the foreground. Some notifications might be dropped if the queue overflows.
